header.title: Topic Preview for Precise Similar Topics II v1.2.X
header.description:
Gives the "Topic Preview" effect to my Precise Similar Topics II MOD, allowing users to see topic previews when they hover the mouse over the titles of Similar Topics.
Note: All changes will be made to Precise Similar Topics II MOD files. Please back up your original files before modifying them.
header.author-notes: Requirements: You must already have installed "Precise Similar Topics II" (v1.2.0 or newer) and "Topic Preview 2.0.2" on your forum.
